-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron frowns as he watches Pegatron go for his arm, "The foolish 
maximal wants to leave. Well, you're lucky this time, I have more 
pressing things to attend to." He transforms, and starts flying 
towards where Warhead's last position was.

He opens a comm to the Predacons in and around the 
base, "Switchblade you're in charge while i'm gone. Waspinator, 
patrol the area, and engage any enemies who may find their way here. 
Perceptor, Nemesis Enforcer has dropped a lot of weapons off at the 
engine room, you and switchblade will modify and assemble them into 
auto guns and sentry turrets using the left over parts from the 
crash."

Switchblade nods to himself, "Alright Megsy, we'll get the ship 
defenses setup." He goes back to work.
